result.arabic_text: قُلۡ كَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ شَهِيدَۢا بَيۡنِي وَبَيۡنَكُمۡۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ بِعِبَادِهِۦ خَبِيرَۢا بَصِيرٗا
result.translation: Babwire kandi uti: “Imana Allah ubwayo Irakwiye kuba Icabona hagati yanje na mwe, ko ndi Intumwa vy’ukuri. Mu vy’ukuri, Imana Allah Yamye ari Muhetuziwavyose, Nyenukubona, Irazi neza ibikorwa n’abaja bayo, nta na kimwe Iyobewe”.
